EmailTemplate.description: How to send a wire transfer
EmailTemplate.name: Wire Transfer
EmailTemplate.subject: Wire Transfer Request Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting BankX.
A wire transfer may be initiated by filling out our Wire Transfer form. You can find our Wire Transfer form on our website; go to Bank of Internet USA Home Page, hover over Customer Support, click on Online Banking Forms, and then Wire Transfer Form.
BOFI Wire Transfer Request Form
Please note that there is $35 fee to send a Domestic Wire and a $45 fee for International Wires. Wire Transfers cannot be future dated and must be received by 12:00pm (PT) for Domestic wires and 12:00pm (PT) for International wires to be processed the same day. Wires received on Saturday, Sunday, or a holiday will be processed on the next business day.
We appreciate your business and commit to delivering value that will make Bank of Internet USA your first choice for all your banking needs.
Best Regards,
BankX Customer Support Team
www.BankX.com | testcustomerservice@bankofinternet.com
